DOCU_Docu.DOC:
About the Package An action pack for CA APIM (Policy manager)that used to migrate any API from a gateway to other(one environment to another).
=Supported versions= CA APIM version 9.3.00
=Setup= * This Action pack uses REST RA Agent. * The Agent should be able to access CA APIM rest API endpoint URL in order to make HTTP requests.
=Common Inputs= Gateway Export API Policy URL: The URL specifies the entry point of the CA APIM REST service. E.g. https://vviecentos02:8443/ Rest RA Agent parameters: Specifies Authentication details, proxy settings, connection timeout, and REST RA Agent Name.
=Actions= Following actions are supported.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_APIM.PUB.ACTION.EXPORT_POLICY * Action Description: This action exports gateway API Policy.
* Action name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_APIM.PUB.ACTION.IMPORT_POLICY * Action Description: This action imports gateway API Policy.
